snippet: A Princeton professor puts an economic spin on his activities, from reading to music to tennis.
abstract: Download interview with Alan B Krueger, a professor of economics and public affairs at Princeton University, who has been appointed chairman of Pres Obama's Council of Economic Advisers; Krueger offers suggestions for reading, music and entertainment.
lead_paragraph: A Princeton professor puts an economic spin on his activities, from reading to music to tennis.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: White House Council of Economic Advisers
